p: The dry mass values of all radish cultivars germinated on S. canadensis extracts, did not differ significantly, compared to the control. The percentage of water content in ‘Rowa’ radish seedlings was significantly lower for seedlings watered with macerate. For the ‘Półdługa’ and ‘Krakowianka’ cultivars, no statistically significant changes were found in the values of this parameter ( Table 4).
